import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {AuthHook} from '../hooks/AuthHook' export const SignIn = () => { const history = useHistory() const [form, setForm] = useState({ username : '', password: '' }) const changeHandler = e => { setForm({...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const loginHandleer = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const urlLogin = 'http://localhost:8000/api/auth/login' const response = await fetch( urlLogin, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept' : 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(form) } ) .then(response => { return response.json(); }) .then(data => { console.log(data); }) history.push('/') } return (

Sign in

With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.

Your username is required.
Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.
) }
